content.raw: I just noticed that the summary and score log files always get written to the same log folder. Everything simulation is run a new log directory is created in `/tmp/ign`, e.g. `log`, `log(1)`, `log(2)`, etc. but the summary and score log files it will always be written to `/tmp/ign/log`, overwriting existing files. This probably won’t affect cloudsim since sim is only run once in the same docker container.
content.html: I just noticed that the summary and score log files always get written to the same log folder. Everything simulation is run a new log directory is created in /tmp/ign, e.g. log, log(1), log(2), etc. but the summary and score log files it will always be written to /tmp/ign/log, overwriting existing files. This probably won’t affect cloudsim since sim is only run once in the same docker container.
